content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; connect-src http: https:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://chrome-devtools-frontend.appspot.com; img-src 'self' data:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; frame-src 'self' about:
description: Missing cookie manager for Google Chrome. Edit and create cookies right in the Developer Tools.
name: Cookie Inspector
